name: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack online store with product catalog, cart, and checkout.
meeting_notes:
Project: E-commerce Platform

Requirements:
1. User Authentication (Customers & Admins)
2. Product Catalog (Categories, Search, Filters)
3. Shopping Cart & Checkout (Stripe integration)
4. Order Management (History, Status updates)
5. Inventory Management

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React + Tailwind
- Backend: FastAPI
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Payments: Stripe

name: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: B2B dashboard for visualizing business metrics and reports.
meeting_notes:
Project: SaaS Analytics Dashboard

Requirements:
1. Multi-tenant architecture
2. Real-time data ingestion pipeline
3. Interactive charts (Recharts/D3)
4. Custom report builder
5. Team collaboration features

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Next.js
- Backend: Go / Python
- DB: TimescaleDB / ClickHouse
- Cache: Redis

name: Mobile Banking App
description: Secure mobile application for personal finance management.
meeting_notes:
Project: Mobile Banking App

Requirements:
1. Biometric Authentication
2. Account Balance & Transaction History
3. Money Transfers (P2P, Bank Wire)
4. Bill Payments
5. Security (Encryption, Audit logs)

Tech Stack:
- Mobile: React Native / Flutter
- Backend: Java Spring Boot
- DB: Oracle / PostgreSQL

name: Healthcare Patient Portal
description: HIPAA-compliant portal for patients to manage appointments and records.
meeting_notes:
Project: Healthcare Patient Portal

Requirements:
1. HIPAA Compliance & Security
2. Patient Registration & Profile
3. Appointment Scheduling (Calendar integration)
4. Medical Records Access (Lab results, Prescriptions)
5. Doctor-Patient Messaging

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Angular
- Backend: .NET Core
- DB: SQL Server

name: Fintech Trading Dashboard
description: Real-time stock trading interface with live charts and execution.
meeting_notes:
Project: Fintech Trading Dashboard

Requirements:
1. Real-time WebSocket Data Feed
2. Order Execution (Buy/Sell/Limit)
3. Portfolio Management
4. Technical Analysis Charts
5. Low-latency performance

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React + WebGL
- Backend: Rust / C++
- Messaging: Kafka

name: Social Media Analytics
description: Platform to track and analyze brand sentiment across social networks.
meeting_notes:
Project: Social Media Analytics Tool

Requirements:
1. API Integrations (Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook)
2. Sentiment Analysis (NLP)
3. Keyword Tracking & Alerts
4. Competitor Analysis
5. Automated Reporting

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Vue.js
- Backend: Python (FastAPI)
- AI: HuggingFace Transformers
